info.description: Backend API untuk manajemen prestasi mahasiswa
info.title: Achievement Management Backend API

get.description: Get list of achievements based on user role. Admin: all achievements, Dosen Wali: advisee's achievements, Mahasiswa: own achievements

parameters.description: Search by title, description, or tags
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create new achievement. Mahasiswa: only for themselves, Admin: for any student (require student_id), Dosen Wali: cannot create

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid data or missing fields

404.description: Not Found - Student not found (for admin)

get.description: Get achievement details by ID. Access based on role: Admin: all, Dosen Wali: advisee's, Mahasiswa: own

put.description: Update achievement. Only draft achievements can be updated. Mahasiswa: own achievements only, Admin: all achievements

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID or not draft status

403.description: Forbidden - Not owner or role not allowed

delete.description: Delete achievement. Only draft achievements can be deleted. Mahasiswa: own achievements only, Admin: all achievements

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID or not draft status

403.description: Forbidden - Not owner or role not allowed

post.description: Upload file attachment to achievement. Only draft achievements can have attachments uploaded

parameters.description: File to upload (max 10MB, allowed: PDF, JPEG, PNG, DOC, DOCX)
parameters.name: file

400.description: Bad Request - File required, too large, or wrong type

post.description: Reject submitted achievement with rejection note. Only submitted achievements can be rejected

400.description: Bad Request - Missing rejection note or not submitted status

403.description: Forbidden - Not advisor or role not allowed

post.description: Submit draft achievement for verification. Only draft achievements can be submitted
Verify submitted achievement. Only submitted achievements can be verified. Dosen Wali: only advisee's achievements, Admin: all achievements

403.description: Forbidden - Not advisor or role not allowed

post.description: Authenticate user with username/email and password

get.description: Get authenticated user profile with role-specific data

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get list of all lecturers with user details and advisees count. Admin only.
Get list of students supervised by specific lecturer. Admin: any lecturer, Dosen Wali: only self

200.description: List of advisees with achievement stats

get.description: Get achievement statistics based on user role. Admin: all statistics, Dosen Wali: advisee's statistics, Mahasiswa: own statistics
Get detailed achievement report for specific student. Admin: all students, Dosen Wali: only advisees, Mahasiswa: only self
Get list of all students with user details and advisor information. Admin only.
Get student details by ID. Admin: any student, Dosen Wali: only advisees, Mahasiswa: only self
Get achievements for specific student. Admin: any student, Dosen Wali: only advisees, Mahasiswa: only self

put.description: Assign or remove advisor for student. Admin only.

get.description: Get list of all active users with pagination. Admin only.

post.description: Create new user with role-specific profile (Mahasiswa/Dosen Wali). Admin only.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid data or missing required fields

get.description: Get list of inactive/soft-deleted users. Admin only.
Search users by full name. Admin only.
Get user details by ID. Admin only.

delete.description: Soft delete user by ID. Admin only.
